net.sf.mmm.client.ui.gwt.widgets.richtext

Class AbstractSelectionFeatureBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.client.ui.gwt.widgets.richtext.AbstractFeatureBehavior
      • net.sf.mmm.client.ui.gwt.widgets.richtext.AbstractClickFeatureBehavior
        • net.sf.mmm.client.ui.gwt.widgets.richtext.AbstractSelectionFeatureBehavior
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.ClickHandler, com.google.gwt.event.shared.EventHandler, AttributeReadEnabled, AttributeReadVisible, AttributeWriteEnabled, AttributeWriteVisible, FeatureBehavior
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FeatureBehaviorFontFamily, FeatureBehaviorFontSize

    abstract class AbstractSelectionFeatureBehavior
extends AbstractClickFeatureBehavior
    A variant of AbstractClickFeatureBehavior for a selection feature that is offered as a combobox.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
